casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Thomas Craig CAMPBELL 252PA14-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 1, 2018 Barbara S. Blackman, Hannah H. Love, Assistant Appellate Defenders, for Campbell, Thomas Craig Teresa M. Postell, Assistant Attorney General, Mike Miller, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 1st of October 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of October 2018."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 7th day of November 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
